item.title: Python or R? You don't have to choose!
item.description: Python or R? You don't have to choose! Why is this significant? Python is a widely-used coding language employed for a variety of purposes in computer science. In my Computational Biology class, we used Python and R in very similar ways, and in doing so learned how the two languages may be able to accomplish similar end goals, but they still each have certain strengths over the other.
